mods.railcraft.api.core

Interface IPostConnection


  • public interface IPostConnection
    If you want your block to connect (or not connect) to posts, implement this interface. The result takes priority over any other rules.
    Author:
    CovertJaguar

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IPostConnection.ConnectStyle

      Methods

      Deprecated. 
      IPostConnection.ConnectStyle connectsToPost(IBlockAccess world, int x, int y, int z, ForgeDirection side)
      Return the ConnectStyle that should be used if the block at this location connects to a post.

        @Deprecated
boolean connectsAt(IBlockAccess world,
                            int x,
                            int y,
                            int z,

        Deprecated.
